verses.text: PEA kātoa mai ‘a e fakataha ‘o ha‘a ‘Isileli ki Sailo, ‘o nau fokotu‘u ‘a e Tēniti Fe‘iloaki‘anga ‘i he potu ko ia: pea na‘e vaivai ‘a e fonua kiate kinautolu.
Ka na‘e kei toe ‘i ha‘a ‘Isileli ha matakali ‘e fitu kuo te‘eki vahe hanau tofi‘a.
Pea lea ‘a Siosiua ki ha‘a ‘Isileli, Ko futu ho‘omou fakatuai ke ‘alu atu ‘o ma‘u ‘a e fonua kuo foaki kiate kimoutolu ‘e Sihova ko e ‘Otua ‘o homou tupu‘anga?
‘Omi hamou tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko tolu mei he matakali takitaha; Pea te u fekau atu kinautolu, pea te nau tutu‘u ‘o ‘alu atu ki he fonua, ‘o tohi ia koe‘uhi ko ha vahe tofi‘a ka fai:

pea nau toki ha‘u kiate au. Pea te nau vahevahe ia ko e tofi‘a ‘e fitu; ‘e nofo ai pē ‘a Siuta ‘i hono vahe ‘i he feitu‘u ko Tonga, pea ko e fale ‘o Siosifa te nau nofo ai pe ‘i honau vahe ‘i he tokelau.
Pea te mou tohi ‘a e fonua ko e tofi‘a ‘e fitu, pea te mou ‘omi hono tohi kiate au ki heni: pea te u fai ‘a e talotalo ma‘amoutolu ‘i heni ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova ko hotau ‘Otua.

He ‘oku ‘ikai ke tofi‘a fakataha mo kimoutolu ‘a e kau Līvai, he ko e ngāue fakataula‘eiki kia Sihova ko honau tofi‘a ia: pea ko Kata mo Lūpeni, mo e vaeua ‘o e matakali ‘o Manase, kuo nau ma‘u honau tofi‘a ‘i he kauvai ‘e taha ‘o Soatani ki hahake, ‘a ia na‘e tufa kiate kinautolu ‘e Mōsese ko e Sevāniti ‘a Sihova.

Pea na‘e tutu‘u ‘a e tu‘unga me‘a, ‘o ‘alu: pea tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Siosiua kiate kinautolu na‘e ‘alu ke tohi ‘a e fonua, ‘o pehē, ‘Alu, ‘o foli ‘a e fonua, ‘o tohi ia, pea foki kiate au, pea te u fai ‘a e talotalo ma‘amoutolu ‘i heni, ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Sihova ‘i Sailo.
Pea ‘alu atu ‘a e kau tangata, ‘o nau ‘asi atu ‘i he fonua, ‘o nau tohi ia fakafo‘i kolo ‘i ha tohi, ko e tofi‘a ‘e fitu: pea na‘a nau omi kia Siosiua, ki he ‘apitanga ‘i Sailo.
Pea fai talotalo ‘e Siosiua ma‘anautolu ‘i Sailo, ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Eiki: pea na‘a ne vahevahe ai ‘a e fonua ki ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘o faka-e-honau-ngaahi-vahe.
Pea na‘e tō mai ‘a e ‘inasi ‘o e matakali ‘o ha‘a Penisimani mo honau ngaahi fāmili: pea na‘e ‘alu atu honau vahe ‘i he vaha‘a ‘o ha‘a Siuta mo ha‘a Siosifa.

Pea ko honau kau‘ā ‘i honau matāfonua ki he tokelau na‘e kamata mei Soatani; ‘o ‘alu hake ki he mui mo‘unga ‘o Sielikō, ‘o tuku ia ki he saute, ‘o ‘alu hake ‘i he fonua mo‘unga ki lulunga, ‘o tū‘ulu ki he toafa ‘o Pete-‘āveni.

Pea mole atu ‘a e kau‘ā mei ai ki Lusa, ki he mui mo‘unga ‘o Lusa, ki he tokelau (ko Pēteli ia); pea ‘alu hifo ‘a e kau‘ā ki ‘Ataloti-‘ātali ‘i he tafa‘aki mo‘unga ‘oku tu‘u mei he potu saute ‘o Pete-holoni-lalo.

Pea afe atu ‘a e kau‘ā, ‘o takai ‘a e matāfonua lulunga ki he tonga, mei he mo‘unga ‘oku ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Pete-hōloni ‘i hono potu tonga, pea na‘e tū‘ulu ki Kiliati-peali (ko Kiliati-sialimi ia), ko e kolo ‘o ha‘a Siuta: ko hono feitu‘u lulunga ia.
Pea ko hono matāfonua tonga na‘e kamata mei he taupotu ‘o Kiliati-sialimi, pea ‘alu atu ‘a e kau‘ā ki lulunga, ‘o tū‘ulu ki he fauniteni ‘o e vai ‘o Nefitoa:

pea ‘alu hifo ki he ngata‘anga ‘o e mo‘unga ‘oku hanga ki he tele‘a ‘o e foha ‘o Hīnomi, ‘a ia ‘oku tu‘u ‘i Tele‘a-Lifaimi mei he tokelau, pea ‘alu hifo ia ki he tele‘a ‘o Hīnomi ki he mui mo‘unga ‘o ha‘a Siepusi, ‘o tuku ia ki he tokelau: pea ‘alu hifo ki ‘Eni-lokeli:
pea afe mei he tokelau, ‘o fou atu ki ‘Eni-semesi, ‘o mole atu ki Keliloti, ‘a ia ‘oku fehangahangai mo Hakenga Kula, ‘o ‘alu hifo ki he Maka ‘o Pōhani ko e hako ‘o Lūpeni:
pea ‘alu atu ai ki he mui mo‘unga ‘oku hanga ki he ‘Alapā ‘o tuku ia ki he saute, ‘o hifo ki he ‘Alapā:

pea ‘asi atu ‘a e kau‘ā ki he mui mo‘unga ‘o Pete-hokela, ‘o tuku ia ki he saute: pea na‘e tū‘ulu ‘a e kau‘ā ki he muitolotolo noate ‘o e Tahi Māsima, ‘a e ngata‘anga ‘o Soatani mei he tonga: ko e kau‘ā tonga ia.
Pea ko Soatani ko e kau‘ā ia ‘i he matāfonua hahake. Ko e tofi‘a ia ‘o ha‘a Penisimani, ‘a hono ngaahi kau‘ā takatakai, mo hono ngaahi vahe.
Pea ko eni ‘a e ngaahi kolo na‘e kau ki he matakali ‘o ha‘a Penisimani, mo honau ngaahi fāmili, ko Sielikō, mo Pete-hokela, mo ‘Emeki-kesisi:
mo Pete-‘ālapa, mo Sima-laimi, mo Pēteli:
mo e ‘Āvimi, mo Pala, mo ‘Ōfila:
mo Kēfali-‘Āmoni, mo e ‘Ōfeni, mo Kepa: ko e kolo ‘e hongofulu mā ua mo honau ngaahi vilisi.
Ko Kinione, mo Lama, mo Pealoti:
mo Mīsipa, mo Kēfila, mo Mosia:
mo Lēkemi, mo ‘Ilipili, mo Tālala:
mo Siela, ‘a ‘Ēlefi, mo Siepusi (ko Selusalema ia), ‘a Kipiati, ‘a Kiliati: ko e kolo ‘e hongofulu mā fā mo honau ngaahi vilisi. Ko e tofi‘a ia ‘o ha‘a Penisimani mo honau ngaahi fāmili.
